headline: Intuit Executive Alex Balazs to Present at the Citi Global TMT Conference
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., August 27, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, announced today that Alex Balazs, executive vice president and chief technology officer will present at the Citi Global TMT Conference on Wednesday, September 3 in New York.

raw.headline: Intuit Executive Alex Balazs to Present at the Citi Global TMT Conference
raw.summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., August 27, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, announced today that Alex Balazs, executive vice president and chief technology officer will present at the Citi Global TMT Conference on Wednesday, September 3 in New York.

headline: Atomic Raises $30 Million to Accelerate Global Expansion of Its Embedded Investing Platform
summary: Atomic, the embedded investing platform powering fintechs and financial institutions, today announced an additional $30 million in growth capital. The round was led by Aquiline, and Brewer Lane with participation from Intuit, Nationwide Ventures, Erie Strategic Ventures, Samsung Next, and Appia Ventures, as well as existing backers QED Investors, Anthemis, and Y Combinator. The financing will accelerate Atomic's regulatory expansion and scale its investing platform across banks, insurers, fintec

headline: Can Intuit Stock Take Out $1,000 in 2025?
summary: Analysts’ high price estimate suggests the stock could surge over 51% to touch $1,000.
